entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.3
entry.content:
ğŸ†• Collect submitter timezone ğŸ Fix MySQL migration bug

Pro

ğŸ†• Add one-off submission PDF and HTML API: https://www.docuseal.com/docs/api#create-a-submission-from-pdf https://www.docuseal.com/docs/api#create-a-submission-from-html

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.4
entry.content:
This update is recommended for all users.

ğŸ PDF image preview generation fix. ğŸ›  Efficient search with inverted index. After updating visit /settings/account and click "Build Search Index" to enable this feature (works only with PostgreSQL).

Pro ğŸ†• Completed embedded document can now be authenticated using JWT with expiration (data-token).

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.5
entry.content: ğŸ›  Allow to select shared link form fields (name, email or phone) ğŸ Fix SQLite queries

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.7
entry.content: ğŸ†• Request Email 2FA via shared links ğŸ›  Adjust font size scaling on small screens ğŸ›  Remove Github and Upgrade buttons from the dashboard ğŸ›  Make it not possible to upload a PDF in the image field
